attributes.review: I think this app is run by the Chinese government because it is so terrible I think it still all of my information! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.review: this app sent a group of kidnappers who were dressed as clowns to come and steal my baby. they then proceeded to brand my forehead with “I LOVE TRUMP, TRUMP 2020-FOREVER”. i would not suggest this app. i don’t support it.

attributes.review: It took wayyy to long to download and the interface is horrible and doesn’t work. I guess I’ll vote Biden 🤷‍♂️

attributes.review: This app is very homophobic, racist and many other things. Also it supports some of the worst things... people dressed up as Cheetos!!! Do NOT get!

attributes.review:
Took forever to download
Sends unsolicited messages to my phone at all hours of the night
Send info to all racist hate groups
I think it gave me covid 19 
It has the wrong kind of mask on. 
No one should wear a pointy hood for a mask!
I’ve tried to delete this junk twice now. It just won’t go away!
attributes.title: Pure junk

attributes.review: i would put 0 stars if that were an option. it portrays a campaign for a homophobic, racist, sexist, and rapist and i ain’t about that. send trump to the ranch along with this app.
